info.name: Simple Dark Tweaks for Flight Rising
info.description: This is an add-on for Simple Dark Theme for Flight Rising. It mainly focuses on workarounds for FireFox, minor bug fixes, and includes optional changes such as even darker dragon cards, scenes compatibility, larger buttons for modals, etc. Screenshot album. Note: If you want to be able to view scenes, you will have to remove some code from the main style (see additional info).
info.additionalInfo: SCREENSHOT ALBUM IS HERE. Install for Stylus via the USO Archive if you want to be able to customize the style directly in Stylus without visiting this page. This is a minor expansion/tweaks/Firefox bug fix for the Simple Dark theme for Flight Rising. This was mostly made for me, but has a few tweaks that others may find useful so I decided to upload it here. You MUST also have the Simple Dark Theme installed in order for this to work properly. -------------- Installation Notes: You can safely ignore the 1st customize dropdown, it doesn't actually do anything. This site is very buggy, and for some reason the first dropdown in the list's value is not updating properly when customized on the user's end no matter what I do or what I put in it. Leaving it blank and not using it was the only thing that worked. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è If you want scene compatibility, you will have to search the Dark Theme's Code for #dragon-profile-scene and either DELETE or COMMENT OUT both instances of the following code: screenshot. -------------- FULL LIST OF FIXES/CHANGES: Bug Fixes: ‚Ä¢ Lucky streak text is changed back to black. ‚Ä¢ Choosing a dragon vista background is now dark when no vista is selected. ‚Ä¢ The alert background is now blue on pages using the old layout. ‚Ä¢ Very long usernames in the forums will now wrap instead of overflowing into the post. ‚Ä¢ Fixed text color when changing clan location. General Changes: ‚Ä¢ Dark check boxes and dropdowns. ‚Ä¢ More obvious disabled buttons (lowered opacity). ‚Ä¢ Lowered brightness of the light gray separators (graydot.png). ‚Ä¢ Breeding ground dragon cards are now dark and the element backgrounds match the lair update. ‚Ä¢ Tomo Color Fixes. ‚Ä¢ Dark marketplace update. ‚Ä¢ Dark world map & world map share widgets. ‚Ä¢ Dark scry share widgets.*** ‚Ä¢ Dark dragon placeholder images for crossroads.** ‚Ä¢ Crim now has a dark speech bubble to match the other trading post speech bubbles.* Optional Changes: ‚Ä¢ Customizable selection text color. Default is light purple text with a black bg. ‚Ä¢ Scenes compatibility ‚Ä¢ Larger buttons in modals (when opening chests, bonding with familiars, applying genes, trading with swipp, etc.) ‚Ä¢ Hoard/Vault - Darker item backgrounds, including less intense colors for selected items & favorite items. ‚Ä¢ Lair/Nesting Grounds - Darker dragon card backgrounds with a light blue gender icon. ‚Ä¢ Softer black outline for bestiary text, and white text for owned awakened familiars for better contrast. * achieved using pseudoelements ** achieved with filter *** achieved with a combination of pseudoelements & filter -------------- Changelog: 2021 ‚Ä¢ Jun. 29 - Various Bug fixes including Tomo's speech bubble trail, the scatterscroll modal, and the final page of Dustcarve Dig. Also Darkened festive favors and gave Joxar a dark speech bubble. ‚Ä¢ Jun. 15 - Various fixes for larger modal buttons and FF images. Darkened Dustcarve Dig/Future Sitewide Efforts and the new Tomo page. ‚Ä¢ Apr. 28 - Added missed images to FF fixes and some missed buttons to larger buttons option. Also added fix for darker dragon cards on the breeding page. ‚Ä¢ Apr. 4 - Minor updates/bug fixes for larger modal buttons code. ‚Ä¢ Apr. 2 - Bug fix related to menus for adding slots to the lair/hibden with larger modal buttons option. Added fixes for disabled gathering buttons. Added a couple of missed images to the FF fixes. ‚Ä¢ Mar. 27/28 - Adding some things I missed to larger modal buttons and FF image fixes. Also fixed issue with clan location selection text color. -------------- Misc. Notes: Conflicting code will be removed or made optional if unnecessary due to updates to the main style. None of my image-related fixes involve editing & replacing images with other image files because I'm too lazy to edit and rehost files. These fixes are all CSS-only and mainly are the result of using CSS filters on existing Flight Rising images or finding work arounds for FireFox that utilize the image replacements present in the main style. I highly recommend my other style, Alt locked items, if you don't like how locked items in the hoard are semi-transparent and would prefer an icon.
